Customize highlights in the table of contents

body.p: The appearance of selected items in the table of contents of WebHelp Classic output can be enhanced.

For example, to highlight the background of the selected item, follow these steps:
Locate the toc.css file in the following directory: [DocBook XSL directory]\com.oxygenxml.webhelp.classic\oxygen-webhelp\resources\css.
Edit that CSS file, find the menuItemSelected class, and change the value of the background property.
Run the transformation. You can also overwrite the same value from your own custom CSS and then specify the path to your CSS in the transformation scenario by using the html.stylesheet parameter and set its value to the path of your custom CSS file.
